author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Markus M. May "Add Product Reviews to the profile Screen" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4736
Currently there is no way for a customer to view her/his reviews created in the ecommerce application. This functionality is added with the attached patch.

msg: CAMEL-5115 CxfBeanDestination should copy the in message header to the out message

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-5117: Polished. Made it a bit easier with camel-twitter as you can configure sendToAll on endpoint.

author: rjung
msg: Allow to set path parameter used when doing JkStripSession
in HTTPD 1.3. This was available for HTTPD 2.x already
Port of r702431 from mod_jk for HTTPD 2.x to 1.3.

author: mostarda
